article_title: Coburn: We Can't Defund Obamacare but Will Amend
article_body: Sen. Tom Coburn on CBS’s “Face the Nation” Sunday.
comment_texts:
What, another traitor??? These politicians stay too long in Washington and then 
drink too much Kool-Aid, then they become useful idiots just like all the Democrats
and RINOs. Throw them out!
